Name: LU 612 - Zoning, 1860 EASTERN PARKWAY, Brooklyn (C 170142 ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 170142 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 612).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Courier;}{\f2\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Arial;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Greenfield and Richards\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on April 7, 2017 its decision dated April 5, 2017 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by Atlantic East Affiliates, LLC,\expndtw-6  \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 17c, which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the development of a new 10-story mixed-use building containing approximately 67 affordable dwelling units in the Ocean Hill neighborhood of Brooklyn, (ULURP No. C 170142 ZMK), Community District 16,\cf1  \cf0\expndtw-4 Borough of the Bronx \expndtw0 (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Application is related to applications N 170143 ZRK (L.U. No. 613), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on May 2, 2017;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued on November 28, 2016 (CEQR No. 17DCP068K), which includes (E) designations to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality, and noise (E-40\f1 0\f0 ) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
RESOLVED:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 170142 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision as follows:\par
\pard\ltrpar\tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 17c:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\qj\tx810\tx1080\f0 1.\tab eliminating from within an existing R6 District a C2-3 District bounded by the southerly boundary line of the Long Island Rail Road Right-Of-Way (Atlantic Division), Eastern Parkway, a line midway between Atlantic Avenue and Pacific Street, and a line 100 feet westerly of Eastern Parkway;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\qj\tx900\tx1080 2.\tab    changing from an R6 District to an R8A District property bounded by the southerly  boundary line of the Long Island Rail Road Right-Of-Way (Atlantic Division) and its easterly prolongation, a line 100 feet easterly of Eastern Parkway, a line midway between Atlantic Avenue and Pacific Street, and a line 100 feet westerly of Eastern Parkway; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\f2\fs20\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\qj\tx1080\f0\fs24 3.\tab establishing within the proposed R8A District a C2-4 District bounded by the southerly boundary line of the Long Island Rail Road Right-Of-Way (Atlantic Division) and its easterly prolongation, a line 100 feet easterly of Eastern Parkway, a line midway between Atlantic Avenue and Pacific Street, and a line 100 feet westerly of Eastern Parkway;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\qj\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sa200\qj\f0 as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated November 28, 2016, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-400, Community District 16,  Borough of Brooklyn\f1 .\f0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720   \tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on May 24, 2017, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr .....................................................\par
City Clerk, Clerk of The Council \par
